StringTable.Label: MigrateWorkshopItems_Tooltip
StringTable.String: Migrate Workshop Items from Stardock Workshop to Steam Workshop. After closing the options screen with this option enabled, the migration process will begin if you are logged on to Steam. If you are in a session, the migration process will not begin until you return to the main menu.

StringTable.Label: MigrateWorkshopItems_Initialization
StringTable.String: Checking for workshop items to migrate...

StringTable.Label: MigrateWorkshopItems_Prompt
StringTable.String: Depending on how many items you have to be migrated, this may take some time. Hit cancel to do the migration some other time.

StringTable.Label: MigrateWorkshopItems_FinalStatus
StringTable.String: Migrated {AMOUNT:1} items. Failures: {AMOUNT:2}. Check {TARGET} for more information.

StringTable.Label: MigrateWorkshopItems_NoFilesFound
StringTable.String: You have no workshop items that need to be migrated.

StringTable.Label: UPDATE_WORKSHOP_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
StringTable.String: Preview Image or screenshot exceeds 1 MB limit
